summary: A spaceship crashes upon an unexplored planet, and the rescuers sent to search for survivors discover that decades have passed due to time dilation.
cast: Wendell Corey|Keith Larsen|John Agar|Paul Gilbert|Merry Anders|Irene Tsu|Robert Ito|Stuart Margolin|Todd Lasswell|Kam Tong|Ron Stokes|Adam Roarke|Paul Hampton|Ronald Lyon|Sally Frei|Suzie Kaye|Hans Wedemeyer|Glenn Langan|Anthony Lee|Joyce Carol|Jamie McRae|Nobuko Miyamoto
